ygData.subject: Re: Mail Runs and a L50
ygData.msgSnippet: Cool!  only 2 levels to go.  basically a mix between beserker and celerity, the best two battle songs, which don t stack.  wow and with no instrument that is
ygData.messageBody:
Cool! only 2 levels to go. basically a mix between beserker and celerity,
the best two battle songs, which don't stack. wow and with no instrument
that is awesome, cause level 50 song is singing skill. i would have to
stack celerity with beserker holding brass instrument to get something
similar, that's if they stacked. cool looking forward to it.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 48 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
Erisi, Level 6 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Brandon Kassebaum [mailto:kassebaum@...]
> Sent: Thursday, July 01, 1999 1:33 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Mail Runs and a L50
>
>
> From: Brandon Kassebaum <kassebaum@...>
>
> I talked to Crip of the FoH last night, another level 50
> bard, and I asked him
> about the new song Verses of Victory. He told me that it is
> a song which
> provides 30 str and 30 agi to your group.... now thats a
> damned nice buff if
> ever I've seen one.
> Penaden Songweaver
> http://www.lostorder.com
>
> Rebecca Small wrote:
>
> > From: Rebecca Small <macha_nabaob@...>
> >
> > Hail Fellow Bards,
> > My guild is on new bard watch for me now, and they reported
> a bard in Halas
> > bank. I did the Qeynos to HighKeep to Freeport runs last
> night and started
> > back again. I am making a list of names and locations as I
> go and will post
> > it as a spoiler maybe when I am reasonably sure it's complete.
> > Also, Xegony has a L50 bard now. I will try to ask him some
> of the questions
> > we talk about, what songs does he use most, what equipemnt
> does he prefer
> > etc, when I see that he is somewhere he can talk. He was in
> gukbottom last
> > night when I noticed he was 50, not a cozy spot to stop and
> chat. Is anyone
> > interested in this enough for me to post his answers?
> >
> > Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
> > Squire Master, Order of the Rose
> > The Right and Noble Order of Excalibur
